normalized: we are now a week into the competitiveexamination for the special camp.
today is the sparring session.
they say this is where many applicants get the boot.
around half of us will go down.
our opponent is, of course, sakura-sensei.
one after the other i watched renowned participantsbeaten into submission, until finally my turn came.

name: sakura
normalized: who's next?

name: tatsurou
normalized: me!
i answer with a ringing voice then take a step forward.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'll be in your care!

name: sakura
normalized: oh, nice spirit!
let see if you can bring it in our fight.
sakura-sensei keeps her pleasant smile on.
even though she already went through several contestants, she isn't sweating at all.
her kodachi are hanging nonchalantly at her waist,since she didn't bother to draw them yet.
a carefree but frightening stance.
she is strong.
overwhelmingly so.
up until now, she barely had to rely on the blades,and didn't use her ninpou at all.
it's hard to believe she was still just a schoolmate only a year ago.
as they keep telling us, taimanin with realcombat experience truly are awesome.

name: sakura
normalized: come at me whenever you want.
give it all you've got, newbie!

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes!
i ready my katana, a heirloom from theakiyama family named yogiri (night fog).
our difference in ability is like heaven and earth.
so i'm going all in right out of the gate.

name: tatsurou
normalized: here i come!

name: tatsurou
normalized: ninpou, fire arts!
i thrust yogiri into the ground and complete my hand signs.
focusing my spirit, i call upon the flame.
thanks to my intensive training this week, the blaze thatforms in front of me is far more intense than it used to be.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yaah!
i channel my will toward sakura-sensei who'scasually standing a few meters ahead.
the scorching inferno flies straight at her.

name: sakura
normalized: oh!
a fastball!
sakura-sensei happily looks at the looming flames.

name: sakura
normalized: this kind of wild swing won't hit me, though!
at the last instant, sakura-sensei nimbly dodges by a hair.
yes, such an obvious move had no chance to connect.
the real deal is now.

name: tatsurou
normalized: fire arts, yamata-no-orochi!
i visualize the explosion.
the projectile splits into eight.
sakura-sensei finds herself surrounded,flames coming from all directions at once.
let's go!

name: sakura
normalized: naive!

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha-!?
with nothing but taijutsu,sakura-sensei smoothly evades all eight shots.
i am enthralled by her fluid motion.
rather than avoiding it, she seems to be dancing with the fire.
an astonished murmur spreads in the audience.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ku!
that isn't going to cut it.
who knew manipulating multiple flames in actual combatconsumed so much energy!?

name: sakura
normalized: what's wrong?
your flames are losing their vigor!
come on, hang in there!
of all things, sakura-sensei is encouraging me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: fuuck!
i muster my willpower.
with all my might, i redirect my projectiles toward sakura-sensei.

name: sakura
normalized: haa!
a sharp yell.
kodachi drawn, sakura-sensei runs like the wind.
in the blink of an eye, all of my flames are snuffed out.

name: tatsurou
normalized: haa, haa, haa, haa…
i'm out of breath.
this took everything i have, and i am now exhausted.

name: sakura
normalized: that's too bad.
before i realize, sakura-sensei is standing next to me.
i'm not even sure what happened.

name: sakura
normalized: you've trained your ninpou well,but the way you use it in combat is sort of naive.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes…i am sorry…

name: sakura
normalized: i like your kind-of-straight offense though.
people used to tell me that my attacks were predictable as well.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i-is that so?
predictable?
i did my best to craft a clever plan.
but my best wasn't nearly enough against a real taimanin.
it seems that getting selected for thespecial camp was a pipe dream after all.

name: tatsurou
normalized: thank…you.
i bow and prepare myself to leave.

name: sakura
normalized: where are you going?
you passed!

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?

name: sakura
normalized: you pass.
from now on you'll train on how toproperly use your ninpou in real battle.
it's mu-chan――i mean, it's murasaki-sensei specialty.

name: tatsurou
normalized: th-thank you!
i bow again, full of zeal this time.
it's like all the energy i spent during the battle came back to me.

name: sakura
normalized: ha, aren't you lively all of a sudden.
boys shouldn't get depressed this easily.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes!

name: sakura
normalized: good, good.
then, who's the next participant?!
sakura-sensei asks the crowd.
but she suddenly looks surprised.

name: sakura
normalized: eh ?
onee-chan?
asagi-sensei had arrived.

name: asagi
normalized: sakura, a word with you.
her face is deadly serious.

name: sakura
normalized: what?
i'm doing my job just fine, you know.
onee-chan, you really have to stop grading my teaching style.

name: asagi
normalized: that's not it.
just come.

name: sakura
normalized: ugh, what is it?
after they step away from us, asagi starts speaking to her.
sakura-sensei's expression immediately turns serious.
i'm not sure what they're talking about,but it's definitely no light matter.
something related to the exam?
or some other mission?
thinking of it, i wonder how yukikaze and rinko-anesheathed mission is going on.
of course i'm not privy to any new information, but i'm still worried.
now that's on my mind,i can't help but have a bad feeling about it.
please let them be safe.
shifting yogiri to an underhand grip,i lower my body and dash toward sakura-sensei.

name: sakura
normalized: oh, a swordfight first-thing?
her eyes are sparkling.
it's good that she thinks so.
neither my swordplay nor my ninpou wouldgive me a chance in a straight fight.
but if i can create the smallest of openings――

name: tatsurou
normalized: yaa!
sakura-sensei indolently draws her twin kodachiand falls into her stance just as i unleash my ittou-ryuu at her.

name: sakura
normalized: eeh, that's pretty sharp swordsmanship.
sakura-sensei might be praising me,but she's nimbly evading my consecutive slashes.
ugh, she's fast!
this isn't the kind of speed rinko-ane possesses, that comesfrom years of practice in a sword style; this is raw talent.
she moves just like the wind.

name: sakura
normalized: i see.
you're rinko-chan's little brother?
then, can you dodge this?
incoming!

name: sakura
normalized: haa!
sakura-sensei's kodachi are darting at me from two angles.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ugh!
what an attack.
her blades move even faster than rinko-ane's sword.
moreover, each of her weapons moves like it has a will of its own.
only the ittou-ryu ingrained in my body and tempered duringmy week of training allows me to barely deflect the blows.

name: tatsurou
normalized: haa!
just as her kodachi are about to meet, i leap over.

name: sakura
normalized: well dodged.
but just jumping like that isn't going to work!
sakura-sensei takes to the sky as well, giving pursuit.
now!
as i'm about to start falling,she readies a strike timed for when i'll be the most vulnerable.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ninpou, paper garments arts.
i finally use my trump card.
that technique reduces my body weight to nothing.
soaring like a leaf on the wind, i smoothly avoid her attack.

name: sakura
normalized: good!
although i spoiled her finishing blow, sakura-sensei praises me.
surely she didn't expect that?
doubts assail me.
thankfully, even she can't escape gravity andshe soon starts her descent toward the ground.
now's my only chance!

name: tatsurou
normalized: yaa!
repeatedly adjusting my weight in irregular patterns,i let loose a flurry of slashes at my opponent.

name: sakura
normalized: nice!
that's the spirit!
sakura-sensei keeps parrying my assaults with her own blades.
that level of agility surely is amongthe best the taimanin have to offer.
i managed to lure my foe midair, but i fail to end it there.

name: tatsurou
normalized: shit!

name: sakura
normalized: come on, your sword is losing it!
just as i hear that――
sakura-sensei, who had been defending thus far, simply vanishes.

name: sakura
normalized: look, you're out of it again.
a voice coming from my back.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha-!?

name: sakura
normalized: hey, caught you.
sakura binds my arms behind my back.

name: sakura
normalized: heave-ho!
and quickly flips my head toward the ground.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uwa!
i frantically nullify my weight, but her grapple makes it pointless.
i simply fall along with sakura-sensei.
until my skull is rammed in the dirt.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i-i yield!

name: sakura
normalized: yep, checkmate.
just before the moment of impact,sakura-sensei reverses my position back to normal.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wh-when did you get behind me?
with a sigh of relief for the feeling of solidground under my feet, i ask the teacher.

name: sakura
normalized: umbral arts.
you're not the only one with tricky moves.
the instructor says so while chuckling.
umbral arts――melding into shadows, moving from oneto another, that's sakura-sensei's secret technique.

name: tatsurou
normalized: but, how did you do it in midair?

name: sakura
normalized: during your unsteady trip back to the ground,it was easy enough to cast a shadow on your body.
she smiles cheerfully while sheathing her kodachi.
could it be that she managed to put a shadow on my backwith one of her weapons in the middle of my attacks?

name: sakura
normalized: you've trained your ninpou well,but the way you use it in combat is sort of naive.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes…i'm sorry…

name: sakura
normalized: luring me to the air was a good plan, the problem wasthat you were unable to exploit the situation.
it seems youare unable to blend your ninpou with your swordmanship.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes…
she exposed me thoroughly.
i can do nothing but nod feebly.
it seems that getting selected for thespecial camp was a pipe dream after all.

name: tatsurou
normalized: thank…you.
as i bow, i begin to leave the training area.

name: sakura

you passed!

from now on you'll train on how toproperly use your ninpou in real battle.
it's mu-chan――i mean, it's murasaki-sensei specialty.

i bow again, full of zeal this time.

name: sakura
normalized: yes, that's better.
after all it wouldn't dofor the ittou-ryuu heir to give up so easily.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes!

normalized: shifting yogiri to an underhand grip,i lower my body and dash toward sakura-sensei.

name: sakura
normalized: oh, a swordfight first-thing?
her eyes are sparkling.
certainly, she's not someone i can hope to defeat in a straight fight.
and yet i launch into a bold frontal assault.
since this is a mock battle, sakura-sensei mostlylimits herself to holding out against our attacks.
i will take advantage of that teacher's mindset of hers.
even if it's just for an instant.
if, using the way of the wind,i can move faster than she expects me to…

name: tatsurou
normalized: ninpou, wind arts.
just before entering her range, i call upon my power.
riding on the gale, i instantly step into her space.
her face changed.
i can do it!

name: tatsurou
normalized: yaa!
i unleash yogiri.
kiin!
sakura-sensei parries my sword using her left kodachi.

name: sakura
normalized: you're pretty fast.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ku!
even though she was caught with her guard down,her reaction was so swift.

name: sakura
normalized: now, let me return the favor!
her right blade flies toward me.
my first strike being blocked is well within my expectations.

name: tatsurou
normalized: haa!
i could deflect her riposte as well,but i have something different in mind.
a burst of compressed air makes the thurst miss wildly.

name: sakura
normalized: ha!?
for the second time the instructor lets out a surprised voice.
this time!

name: tatsurou
normalized: wind arts, gale slash!
raging streams swirl around me.
i rush at my opponent with my vacuum blade.
just when i think that my counter attack succeeded,

name: sakura
normalized: eheh.
sakura-sensei just vanishes.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha-!?

name: sakura
normalized: shadow crossing, umbral arts!
that voice comes from behind me.
i quickly spin around, only to find her weapons pointed at my neck.

name: sakura
normalized: checkmate, right?
sakura-sensei is wearing her trademark cheery smile.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes…
umbral arts――melding in shadows, moving from oneto another, that's sakura-sensei's secret technique.
nevertheless, that speed was something else.
i don't think shadow crossing is akin to teleportation,but it was still incredibly fast.
i never knew what hit me until it was too late.
could this be the strength of a first-class taimanin?

name: sakura
normalized: that was a good effort, but at the very end you panicked.
after losing sight of me, you should have clad yourselfin wind to defend, or just run away.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes, i'm sorry.
i offer a dejected apology.
at my level, reacting to her shadow crossinglike that is nothing more than wishful thinking.

name: sakura
normalized: hey, what's your name?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
ah, it's akiyama tatsurou.

name: sakura
normalized: i see, so you're rinko-chan's younger brother?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes…
we've been training for a week and she still didn't know my name…

it was over in an instant, really.
it seems that getting selected for thespecial camp was a pipe dream after all.

normalized: where are you going?

normalized: th-thank you!

name: sakura
normalized: from now on, you'll learn to control your emotions.
you let your feelings out a little too much.
follow mu-chan――i mean, murasaki-sensei's example.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes!

name: sakura
normalized: i just said your feelings are too overt!
oh well, i guess that's about fine for a young man.

normalized: that's not it.

name: sakura

now that's on my mind, i can't help but have a bad feeling about it.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wind arts.
i know i shouldn't, but i manipulate the air currents to eavesdrop.
i listen to their conversation.

name: sakura
normalized: ――and that's why i said we shouldn't trust that slave trader!

name: asagi
normalized: we had no suitable alternatives to infiltrate yomihara.

name: sakura
normalized: still, rinko-chan and yuki?
they're really skilled, but,you know, i don't think they're used to sneaking.

name: asagi
normalized: true.
putting them on a sheathed mission with thatcunning slaver might have been a bit too much to handle.

name: sakura
normalized: you should have gone instead.

name: asagi
normalized: i would have… but nowadays both ournames are getting a little too well-known.

name: sakura
normalized: no one would believe that a simple slave tradercould capture the asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: that's right.
i'm a little worried, but those two are capable.
and shiranui is yukikaze's mother.

name: sakura
normalized: let's hope those worries don't come to pass, then.
so, what do you need me for?

name: asagi
normalized: i was coming to it.
as i said, we cannotput trust in zokuto, that slave trader.

name: asagi
normalized: that's why i want him monitored, but right now mybest agents are already dispatched on other missions,so there's no one qualified left.

name: sakura
normalized: oh, i see.
so you came to pick me?

name: asagi
normalized: how did you arrive at that conclusion?
you are a teacher.
don't think i'll allow you to shirk your duty midway.

name: sakura
normalized: argh, so you really were evaluating me!

name: asagi
normalized: wrong again.
you've been teaching them for a week now, right?
is there anyone among the participants that could be usedto keep an eye on zokuto?
that's what i want to know.

name: sakura
normalized: ooh, i see!
alright, alright!
just monitoring, right?
no need for fighting skills?

name: asagi
normalized: it's not the priority, but they still need to reach the levelexpected of a taimanin.
i'm not sending anyone to their death.

name: sakura
normalized: got it.
if that the case, i have a number of talented kids.
still, i'd rather have them go through theentire camp before sending them on duty.

name: asagi
normalized: very well.
then, if you notice someonethat could fit the bill, please report to me.

name: sakura
normalized: roger.
but onee-chan, if there's a chancethat zokuto really is deceiving us, shouldn'twe pull out rinko-chan and yuki right now?

name: asagi
normalized: it's certainly possible that they may find themselvesin immediate danger.
on the other hand, they didmanage to infiltrate yomihara.
the mission is on course.

name: sakura
normalized: that's only if you believe zokuto's report, right?

name: asagi
normalized: of course i'm taking that into account.
but you know,it seems shiranui is holding some crucial intelligence.

name: asagi
normalized: i don't understand why, but ever since shiranui has beenconfirmed alive, orders to rescue her asaphave kept coming from the government.

name: sakura
normalized: something is fishy.

name: asagi
normalized: i feel so too.
still, i don't want to pull them out just yet.
the trick they used to slip in yomihara will never work twice.
besides, they are my students.

name: sakura
normalized: alright.
if that's your call then i have nothing to add.
while this isn't anything new, we taimanin sure have it rough.

name: asagi
normalized: fufu, i never thought i'd hear that from you.

name: sakura
normalized: aah!
you're treating me like a child again!
onee-chan, didn't you come to meet an instructor?

name: asagi
normalized: ah, that's right.
i tend to forget when we talk like this.

name: sakura
normalized: damn youuーー
the two teachers begin an unusual, merry banter.
it's hard to believe they were just talking about such serious matters.
do they really have that much poise?
or could it be that for the two veterans,such a situation isn't that dire after all?
in any case, after what i heard there's no way i can stay put.
yukikaze and rinko-ane could be in danger.
besides thinking about it, what should i do?
i have to act as soon as possible!
that mission must be aborted immediately!
that's what i want to shout.
but i can't.
not even mentioning that i just snooped on them,they wouldn't take advice, much less orders, from someone like me.
but i'm so worried, i feel like i'm going to vomit any second now.

name: asagi
normalized: well then, please look into that.

name: sakura
normalized: yeah.
leave it to me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ha…
while i was agonizing over intervening or not,their conversation ended.
asagi-sensei leaves while her sister come back.

name: sakura
normalized: sorry for the wait everyone!
ok, let's continue with the mock battles!
following sakura-sensei's call, a new student steps out for the next spar.
i keep mulling over the issue while watching them.
even if, by any chance, rinko-ane and yukikaze find themselvesin danger, they should be able to handle it somehow.
this is why asagi-sensei selected them to begin with.
they said it: the mission is being executed.
last thing i need to do is to step out of bounds and run my mouth.
instead, i will persevere and make surei'm the one selected to help on the mission.
after all, another thing they said is that they needsomeone to keep tabs on that zokuto guy.
once i'm in, i can help yukikaze and rinko-anewith deeds rather than empty words.
improving my skills.
right now, this is what i must do.
over and over, i exhort myself.
no, i won't say anything.
rather, i should not say anything.
